function apiRemoveMySelf(item)
Remove an auth key of the api
function checkTheAutoSelect()
This function select the key present in listOfAutoSelect
function chooseGPGPath()
Choose a gpg executable and set the values of the options.
function crypt()
Encrypt the current data of the editor.

keyIdList,
fromGpgAuth,
binFileMode)
Encrypt a text.
function cryptandsign()
Encrypt and sign the current data of the editor.

keyIdList,
fromGpgAuth,
password,
keyID,
binFileMode)

function dcrypt()
Decrypt the current data of the editor.
decrypt: function(text,
password)
Decrypt a text.
function fileSelector()
Open the file selected and return the choosen file.
function filter()
This function filter the key list, based on the current value of search-textbox.
getBaseArugments: function ()
Return the commons arugments for all GnuPG’s commands
getGPGBonusCommand: function()
Return the custom arguement the user want to add.
getGPGCommand: function ()
Return the command to execute GnuPG
getGPGCommentArgument: function()
Return a arguement to add a gnupg comment.
getGPGTrustArgument: function (forceNo)
Return a arguement to force gnupg to use not trusted keys.
getRunningCommand: function ()
Return the content of a script to execute GnuPG.
function getSelectedText()
Return the current selected text of the editor.
var GPGAccessCallerUnixNoXpcom = function(parameters,
charset)
This is the function to call gnupg on linux and MacOS, when the xpcom is not available.
var GPGAccessCallerUnixXpcom = function(parameters,
sdtIn,
charset)
This is the function to call gnupg on linux and MacOS, when the xpcom is available.
var GPGAccessCallerWindowsNoXpcom = function(parameters,
charset)
This is the function to call gnupg on windows, when the xpcom is not available.
var GPGAccessCallerWindowsXpcom = function(parameters,
sdtIn,
charset)
This is the function to call gnupg on windows, when the xpcom is available.
isUnix: function()
Return true if we are on a unix system, false if we’re on windows.
kexport: function(key)
Export a key.
kimport: function(text)
Import a key.
listkey: function(onlyPrivate)
List keys.
function loadXpcom ()
This function try to load the xpcom.
function onAccept()
This function is called when the Ok button is pressed.
function onChangeGPGPathCheckbox(checkbox,
focus_textbox)
Called when change-gpg-path-checkbox is checked/unchecked to enable/disable some elements in the options interface.
onDelayMenuAction: function(action)
This function is called to exectue an action.
function onLoad(win)
This function is called when the list.xul form is show.
onLoad: function()
This function is called when a new Firefox’s windows is created.
onMenuItemCommand: function(e,
action)
This function is called when a menu item is selected.
onToolbarButtonCommand: function(e)
This function is called when the user click on a bouton of the toolbar.
function openf()
Open a file a display it into the editor.
function privateKeySelected(listbox)
This function is called when a private key is selected.
runATest: function(option)
Test if we are currently able to run the a command.
runGnupg: function ()
Execute gnupg.
function savef()
Save the current data in the editor to a file
selfTest: function()
Return true if we’re able to call GnuPG.
function setSeletedText(text)
Remplace the current selected text of the editor with the text in parameter.
function showWarnings()
Show warnings if use try to disable updates because it’s bad ^^.
function sign()
Sign the current data of the editor.

password,
keyID)
Sign a text.
tryToFoundTheRightCommand: function ()
Do some test to be able to find a working GnuPG executable.
function updateXpcomState(newstate)
This function compare the status of the usability of the xpcom.
function verify()
Verfiy signs of the current data of the editor.
